info.name: Vietnam Rubber Group - Joint Stock Company
info.description: Vietnam Rubber Group - Joint Stock Company primarily engages in planting, maintaining, exploiting, processing, manufacturing, purchasing, and selling rubber products in Vietnam and internationally. The company offers technical standard and centrifugal rubber products, and rubber sheets, as well as provides seedlings and technical support services. It also engages in raising livestock; planting industrial trees and forests; processing agro-products; manufacturing, purchasing, and selling industrial products, natural rubber, processed wood products, and materials for the rubber industry; and casting, laminating, repairing, installing, and producing mechanical products and other industrial equipment. In addition, the company constructs, exploits, and operates hydropower and thermopower plants, and sells electricity to business and consuming households; provides land transportation, tourism, and trade inspection services, as well as cargo loading, discharging, handling, and delivery services; and produces, purchases, and sells construction materials. Further, it is involved in exploiting and supplying clean water; treatment of wastewater; and engages in mapping; investment consultation; science and informatics consultation; and general education activities, as well as real-estate, hotels, and restaurants businesses. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
